original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī bahussutā hoti bhāṇikā visāradā paṭṭā dhammiṁ kathaṁ kātuṁ.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī bahu sutā hoti bhāṇikā visāra dā paṭṭā dhammim katham kātu

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo uṇhakāle mahagghaṁ khomaṁ pārupitvā yena thullanandā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ uṇha kāle mahaggham khomam pārupitvā yena thullanandā bhikkhunī tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā thullanandam bhikkhunim abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho rājānaṁ pasenadiṁ kosalaṁ thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam kho rājānam pasenadim kosalam thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitaḥ samādapitaḥ samuttejitaḥ sampahasitaḥ thullanandam bhikkhunim etat avoca

original: “Sace me tvaṁ, mahārāja, dātukāmosi, imaṁ khomaṁ dehī”ti.
analyzed: sace me tva mahā rāja dātu kāmaḥ asi imam khomam dehi iti

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā khomaṁ datvā uṭṭhāyāsanā thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā khomam datvā uṭṭhāya āsanā thullanandam bhikkhunim abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi
katham hi nāma rājānam khomam viññāpessanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā rājānaṁ khomaṁ viññāpessatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā thullanandā rājānam khomam viññāpessati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī rājānaṁ khomaṁ viññāpetī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī rājānam khomam viññāpeti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī rājānaṁ khomaṁ viññāpessati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī rājānam khomam viññāpessati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Lahupāvuraṇaṁ pana bhikkhuniyā cetāpentiyā aḍḍhateyyakaṁsaparamaṁ cetāpetabbaṁ. Tato ce uttari cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: lahu pāvuraṇam pana bhikkhuniyā cetāpentiyā aḍḍhateyyaka saparamam cetāpetabba tatas ce uttari cetāpeyya nissaggiyam pācittiyanti

original: Nissajjitabbaṁ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
analyzed: nissajjitabbam saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā eka bhikkhuniyā vā

original: “idaṁ me, ayye, lahupāvuraṇaṁ atirekaaḍḍhateyyakaṁsaparamaṁ cetāpitaṁ nissaggiyaṁ, imāhaṁ saṅghassa nissajjāmī”ti …pe…
analyzed: idam me ayye lahu pāvuraṇam atireka aḍḍhateyya kasaparamam cetāpitam nissaggiye imā aham saṅghassa nissajjāmi iti pe
atireka aḍḍhateyya kase atireka saññā cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya
atireka aḍḍhateyya kase ūnaka saññā cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya
ūnaka aḍḍhateyya kase atireka saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
ūnaka aḍḍhateyyaka se vematikā āpatti dukkaṭassa
ūnaka aḍḍhateyya kase ūnaka saññā anāpatti
ūna ka aḍḍhateyya kasa paramam ceta apa iti

original: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, tiṁsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā.
analyzed: uddiṭṭhāḥ kho ayyāyo tisa nissaggiyāḥ pācittiyāḥ dhammāḥ
tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti
